english: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
Yuanmingyuan, the Old Summer Palace, destroyed by the British and French army in 1860
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
ba-wan, dumpling made of glutinous dough, typically stuffed with minced pork, bamboo shoots etc, and served with a savory sauce (Taiwanese snack) (from Taiwanese 肉圓, Tai-lo pr. [bah-uân])
lit. lovely flowers, round moon (idiom); fig. everything is wonderful/perfect happiness/conjugal bliss
